import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Divider , } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconAlignRight, IconAdjustmentsHorizontal, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const ImageTest = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(50); const handleChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleIncrement = () => { const newValue = value + 1; if (newValue <= 100) { setValue(newValue); } }; return ( Image
Change Icon Background Icon Color Size setValue(e.target.value)} style={{ width: "50px" }} /> onChangeEnd value: {endValue} Weight Back Button Radious Content Padding Content Margin Content ); } export default ImageTest
